categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Vaize" was the nickname of a clone trooper in the Grand Army of the Republic. In 22 BBY, he fought in the Battle of Teth, where he was killed by battle droids.
As a male Human clone of bounty hunter Jango Fett, Vaize stood 1.83 meters tall, and was born on the Wild Space planet Kamino.
Vaize first appeared in the 2008 novelization of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars film by Karen Traviss.
